communications.subject: Virginia Freedom of Information Act Request: VCU Communications with Governor Youngkin
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

* All communications between VCU's Office of the Provost or Office of the President and Governor Youngkin or his staff regarding the proposed Racial Literacies Curriculum and syllabi dating from July 2022 - present

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristin Reed

title: Racial Justice Curriculum in Virginia Higher Education (Office of the Governor)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

* any communications to Governor Youngkin or the VDOE expressing concern about the "Just Societies" curriculum at George Mason University dating from January 2023 - present
* any communications to Governor Youngkin or the VDOE expressing concern about the "Racial Literacies" curriculum at Virginia Commonwealth University dating from January 2023 - present

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristin Reed
